meanings.definition: Acting in a clumsy or inept manner.
meanings.sent1: The bumbling waiter spilled soup on the customer.
meanings.sent2: He is known for his bumbling attempts at fixing things.
meanings.sent3: The bumbling clown tripped over his own oversized shoes.
meanings.sent4: Her bumbling dance moves made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The bumbling detective always solves cases by accident.

meanings.definition: Moving or speaking in a confused or awkward way.
meanings.sent1: The bumbling professor forgot his lecture notes.
meanings.sent2: She gave a bumbling speech at the event.
meanings.sent3: The bumbling tourist got lost in the city.
meanings.sent4: His bumbling attempts to flirt made her smile.
meanings.sent5: The bumbling robot kept bumping into walls.
